items.content_html: A lightweight, in-browser SQL database that lets you upload CSV files and run SQL queries on them instantly. Built using React and sql.js, this app runs entirely in your browser, requiring no server or backend.

items.content_html: Commercetools Functional Architect Learning Environment – An interactive, structured, and hands-on learning platform for commercetools Functional Architect training. This project includes session-based navigation, quizzes, case studies, note-taking features, and interactive infographics, all powered by a lightweight User interface

items.content_html: A lightweight and scalable multiple-choice exam system built using Deno as the backend runtime and MySQL as the database. The system provides an efficient way to create, manage, and evaluate exams while ensuring security, performance, and ease of use. It is designed for students, teachers, and administrators with role-based access control
items.title: Harold12002/exam-hive-backend: A lightweight and scalable multiple-choice exam system built using Deno as the backend runtime and MySQL as the database. The system provides an efficient way to create, manage, and evaluate exams while ensuring security, performance, and ease of use. It is designed for students, teachers, and administrators with role-based access control

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
